src: "Ko'ãga roguereko anguja oguerekova 4-jasy ary ha ndoguerekói tuguy azuka, ha oguereko kuri tuguy azuka", he'i ha'e.
mt: "It's been four days since the last rain and it's not going to rain again for a while," he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, mbo'ehara medicina pegua Mbo'eha Guasu Dalhousie Halifax pe, Nueva Escocia pe, ha mburuvicha pe division clinico ha cientifico pe Joaju Canadiense Tuguy Azuka regua pe, he'i kuri pe tapykueho oimeha iñepyrũhaitepe gueteri.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a clinical and scientific division head at the Canadian Cancer Society in Halifax, Nova Scotia, says the study is a "very important first step."
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Umi ambue expertoicha avei, ha'e ndogueroviái pe tuguy azuka ikatuha oñemonguera, ha oikuaauka ko ojuhúva ndoguerekoiha importancia umi avakuérape oguerekóma vaekue Tuguy Azuka tipo I-pe g̃uarã.
mt: Other experts say the virus is not yet airborne, and that the importance of the new strain is still being assessed.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Arakõipe, Sara Danius, secretaria permanente Comité Nobel Ñe'ẽporãhaipyrepe upe Academia Sueca pe, oikuauka kuri publicamente peteĩ radio programa jave upe Radio Sveriges pe, Suecia pe, upe comité ndaikatúigui oñe'ẽ Karai Bob Dylan ndive omombe'u haguã chupe ogana hague pe Premio Nobel Ñe'ẽporãhaipyrepe 2016 pegua, ohejama kuri pe ñeha'ã oñe'ẽ haguã hendive.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, the body that awards the Nobel Prize in Literature, publicly announced on a radio program on the Swedish Radio Sveriges that the committee had decided not to award the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, citing the "poor conditions" in which the prize was being awarded.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius omomarandu kuri "Ko'agãite ndorojapói mba'eve hina. Ahenoi ha amondo correo kuri umi icolaborador kuera pe ha oguahẽ cheve ñembohovái angirũ portepe. Ko'agã upea pee mante.
mt: "We are deeply saddened by this. We are in contact with the families of the deceased and will provide all the help we can. Our thoughts are with the families."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Upe mboyvemi, Ring Mburuvicha, Jamie Siminoff, omombe'úkuri pe mba'apoha oñepyrũkuri upe hóga timbre noñehendúirõguare upe iñemuhágui imba'yru renda peve.
mt: The inventor, Jamie Siminoff, said the device was designed to be used by people who don't have a landline.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Ha'e ojapo peteĩ timbre oikova wifi reheve, he'i kuri.
mt: He said he was printing a stamp that worked with Wi-Fi.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff he'íkuri pe ñemu ojupi tuicha ha'e osẽ rire Shark Tank episodio-pe 2013-pe, upépe umi show panel-pegua ombotovékuri ome'ẽ hag̃ua chupe pirapire oñepyrũ hag̃ua iñemuha.
mt: Siminoff appeared on Shark Tank in 2013, where the show's panel offered him a deal to help him launch the product.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Upe 2017 pahape, Simminoff osẽ kuri canal QVC ñemuha reheguape.
mt: 2017, Simminoff will be leaving QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring odemanda precesso avei pe mba'apoha seguridad pegua, Mba'apoha ADT.
mt: The incident is also being investigated by the Department of Aviation Security.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Jepérõ peteĩ vacuna de ensayo ha'ete omboguejýva pe ñemano Ebola rupive, ko'ágã peve, ni peteĩ poha ndohechaukaporãi kuri ikatuha oipohano pe infeccion.
mt: A vaccine candidate for Ebola has been shown to be safe in humans, but it is not yet known if it can prevent infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Peteĩ anticuerpo oñembojehe'ava, Zmapp, ñepyrũra ohechauka kuri oikotaha ko area pe, téra jeitypeka porãve ohechauka kuri oguerekoha sa'ive mba'e porã oñeha'ãrovaekuegui ojoko haguã ñemano.
mt: A new antibody, Zmapp, is being tested in this area, and it appears to be working well in treating the disease, which has a high mortality rate.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM ñeha'ãpe, Zmapp ojepuru kuri controlra, pea he'ise hina umi cientifico kuera oipuru chupe linea de baserã ha oñembojoja kuri ambue mbohapy ñepohano rehe.
mt: PALM is a smallpox vaccine, Zmapp is a control, and the scientists who developed it are working on other diseases.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Umi Gimnasta kuera Estados Unidos pegua ombojeko pe kuatia ñe'ẽ Comite Olimpico Estados Unidos mba'e ha omboaje pe ñeikotevẽ mbarete umi togaygua Olimpico opromociona haguã peteĩ tekoha isegurova opavave ñande atleta kuerape.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee has banned the gymnast from the United States for life and stripped her of her medals for her role in promoting a product at the 2012 Summer Olympics.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Ore roñe'ẽjoja upe USOC he'ivandive, ñande atleta ha club kuera interes, ha ideporte kuera, ikatu oñeñangareko porãve oñemboguatarõ moambue guasu ñande aty guasu pa'ũguive, ha ani haguã oiko pe jekuatia'o.
mt: The USOC has said that athletes and clubs that are interested, and the sport itself, can benefit greatly from the new agreement, and that it will be good for the sport.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Gimnasta Joaju Estados Unidos pegua ombojeko peteĩ jetypeka isãsova ha ikatuva omohesakã mba'éichapa umi abuso peichagua oñemombe'u kyhyje'ỹrete umi ohasa vaekue Larry Nassar ha ikatuva kuri ohasa ojeikuaa'ỹre areterei ha oañuava opaichagua ñeikotevẽva ha iporãva moambue kuera.
mt: Gymnast McKayla Maroney, who was sexually abused by Larry Nassar, has filed a lawsuit against the United States Olympic Committee and USA Gymnastics, alleging that they failed to protect her and other athletes from Nassar's abuse.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Gimnasta Joaju Estados Unidos pegua ha USOC oguereko peteĩ temimo'ã - tojejapo pe deporte gimnasta ha ambue kuera, añete ikatuháicha umi atleta kuerape guara oheka haguã ikerayvoty kuera peteĩ jeikoha añeteva, positivo ha oñemombareteva.
mt: 2008 Olympic gold medalist and USOC member Shawn Johnson has been suspended for one year for violating the organization's anti-doping policy.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Upe 1960 kuerajave, Brzezinski omba'apo kuri John F. Kennedy ndive iconsehero ramo ha upei Lyndon B. Johnson administracion pe avei.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Upe 1976 jeiporavo jave, ha'e oaconseja Carter pe tetã ambue kuera moñondiveha, ha upei oservi Consejero Segurida Nacional pe (NSA) 1977 guive 1981 peve, Henry Kissinger rendaguepe.
mt: 1976, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981 under President Jimmy Carter.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA pe, ha'e oipytyvõ Carter pe oñangarekovo upe tetãkuera moñondivepe, ha'eháicha upe Camp David ñemoĩ peteĩ ñe'ẽpe, 1978 pe; omoĩporã upe EE.UU. ha China  moñondive upe 1970 paháirupi; Iran revolucion, ogueravaekue pe Iran crisi tapicha rehen rehegua, 1979 pe; ha upe Union Sovietica oikerõguare mbaretepe Afganistan pe, 1979 pe.
mt: NSA, which is headed by former President Carter, is said to have been involved in the Camp David Accords, which were signed in 1978; the U.S. and China normalization, which began in the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, which began in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Pe ta'angamyi omo'akãva hina Ryan Gosling ha Emma Stone, ojapyhy kuri ñembohéra opavave categoria tuichavape.
mt: 2017's Best Picture Oscar nominees Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone were among the winners.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ha Stone ojapyhy ñembohéra actor ha actriz porãvevape guara.
mt: Gosling and Stone were both nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Ambue ñembohérakuerape oike hina Ta'anga Porãve, Sãmbyhyhára, Cinematografia, Aokuera Jejapo, Ta'angaryryi Edicion, Purahéi Teete, Produccion Jejaporã, Mba'epu Edicion, Mba'epu Mbojehe'a ha Jehai Ta'angarechahape guara teeteva.
mt: Other awards include Best Actor, Best Cinematography, Best Editing, Best Sound, Best Visual Effects, Best Production Design, Best Editing, Best Makeup and Hairstyling.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Mokõi purahéi upe ta'ãngaryryipegua, Audición (The Fools Who Dream) ha Táva Mbyjakueraguigua, ojapyhy  purahéi ñembohéra iporãveva teetépe g̃uarã. Estudio Liongate ojapyhy 26 ñembohéra, hetaiteve ambue estudio-kuéragui.
mt: The two songs, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", were nominated for Best Original Song at the 89th Academy Awards. Lionsgate released the film on December 25, 2016, in the United States, and other Lionsgate-owned companies released it in other countries.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Pe arateĩ ka'aruete, mburuvicha Estados Unidos pegua Donald Trump, peteĩ marandupe osẽva secretaria prensa pegua rupive, omomarandu kuri umi Estados Unidos tropa kuera osẽtaha Siriagui.
mt: The U.S. president, Donald Trump, in a tweet on Sunday, announced that U.S. troops are being sent to Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Ko momarandu ojejapo kuri Trump oñe'ẽ rire ñe'ẽmbyry rupive mburuvicha Turquia pegua ndive Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
mt: This announcement was made by Trump after a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turquia avei oñatendeta tahachiramo umi ISIS milicia kuerare ojejagarra vaekue, ha upe marandu he'e kuri, umi tetã kuera Europa pegua ombotove kuri omondo jey haguã hetã kuerape.
mt: Turkey also has been fighting ISIS militants, and the conflict has spilled over into neighboring countries, including those in Europe.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Pea ndaha'éi omo'añete añova ambue dinosaurio kuera oguereko hague guyrarague, peteĩ teoria ojeikuaava oparupi, tera ome'ẽ mbosa'iha umi kangue yvyvy ndome'ẽiva, techaukarã sa'y ha mbohapy dimensionpe.
mt: A new theory suggests that the dinosaurs' extinction was caused by a comet that hit the ocean, causing a global tsunami, acid rain and a nuclear winter.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Umi cientifico kuera he'i ko mymba guyrarague ha'e hague sa'y castaño - marrõ yvate ha sa'yjuguy tera carotenoid yvygotyo.
mt: The scientists say the compound is a mixture of two carotenoids, lutein and zeaxanthin, found in egg yolks and green leafy vegetables.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Avei otopa hikuái tuicha mba'ekuaa pe evolucion guyrarague rehegua umi guyrakuerare.
mt: Also, the evolution of the species is not yet complete.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Upéva hína pe dinosaurio rague ndoguerekói rehe peteĩ mbytegua ojedesarrolla porãva, hérava raquis, katu hague heko ambue - mba'e akua ha pe pira kangue joguaha - umi jeporekahára he'i kuri ko'ãva ha'eha peteĩ desarrollo evolutivo umi característica rireguáma.
mt: This is the first dinosaur to be found with a complete tail, called a "pygostyle", which is similar to the tail of modern birds, but unlike the tails of other dinosaurs. The researchers say this suggests that the dinosaur was a transitional form between dinosaurs and birds.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Upe guyrarague kuera ohechauka ndojepurúi hague ojeveve haguã tera ocontrola haguã arapytu tera ohechauka haguã. Umi investigador kuera he'i kuri, jepe pea ha'e peteĩ dinosaurio ra'y ruguái, pe techarã ohechauka guyra rague okakuaapava regua ha ndaha'éi peteĩ michĩva regua.
mt: The fossil was found in a quarry that was not being actively controlled, and the researchers say that the dinosaur was probably not a target of the quarrying operation, but was simply found in the rock.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Umi investigador kuera he'i kuri, jepe pea ha'e peteĩ dinosaurio ra'y ruguái, pe techarã ohechauka guyra rague okakuaapava regua ha ndaha'éi peteĩ michĩva regua.
mt: The researcher said, "It's a dinosaur that lived in the rainforest, not in the desert, and it was not a small animal."
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Peteĩ coche bomba okapu kuri upe tahachi kuera cuartel Gaziantep peguape, Turquia ojuka kuri mokõi tahachipe kuehe pyharevepe ha odegrasia ambue 21 tapicha kuerape.
mt: 21 people were injured when a car bomb exploded outside a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Upe mburuvicha oficina guive he'i kuri 19 ojedegrasia vaekue ha'eha tahachi.
mt: 19 degrees Celsius was the temperature in the office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Tahachi kuera omalisia hina ikatu hague upe Daesh (ISIL) milíko ojapo pe atake.
mt: The attack was claimed by the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ha'ekuera odescubri kuri pe Kuarahy omba'apoha umi principio ambue mbyja kueraicha: Opavave mbyjakuera mba'apo ko sistema pe ojetopa kuri ojeimpulsa hina upe hendykue rehe, ijere, ha upevante.
mt: It was discovered that the sun is the first star in the solar system to be born: It was pushed by the system's first impulse, and then, the rest.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Pe hendykue ha ijere ojeipuru oñondive oñemoi haguã Rossby papaha, upeva ojerelaciona hina upe plasma flujore.
mt: The jet stream is related to the Coriolis effect, which is caused by the rotation of the Earth.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Ha michĩvero upe Rossby papaha, sa'ive omba'apo upe mbyja  inversion magnetica rehe.
mt: The Rossby wave is a large-scale oceanic and atmospheric phenomenon that is driven by the Coriolis effect.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Upe ijeho jave, Iwasaki oike heta apañuãime.
mt: Iwasaki was also injured.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Pirata-kuéra omonda kuri chupe, Tibet katu oataka chupe jagua rabioso, okañy kuri ñemendagui Nepal-pe ha upéi kuri opyta arrestado India-pe.
mt: 3 pirates were killed, 1 was wounded, and 1 was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Upe 802.11n estandar omba'apo hina ambue frecuenciape 2.4Ghz ha 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n standard operates on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Pea ikatu hina ojapo chugui compatible hapykue gotyo umi 802.11a, 802.11b ha 802.11g ndive, pea ikaturamo upe puhoe base oguereko mokõi puhoe.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all compatible, and the base station can handle two phones.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Upe 802.11n pya'ekue iñakuãvéva umi henonderaẽvévagui, ipya'evéva 600Mbit/s peve.
mt: 802.11n is the first standard to provide true gigabit speeds, with a maximum of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duval, omendava ha oguerekova mokõi mitã okakuaapamava, ndohejái peteĩ jehecha tuicha Millerpe, upe mombe'u omoñondiveiva.
mt: 2 children were killed and one was injured, none of them were Miller's children.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Oñeporanduro guare chupe peteĩ comentariore, Miller he'i kuri "Mike heta oñe'ẽ kuri upe audienciape, che añembo sako'i hina kuri ha upevare nahendúi kuri ha'e he'i vaekue hina".
mt: In a comment, Miller said, "Mike was very clear to the audience that he was not a scientist, but that the science was very clear and very strong."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Roñeha'ãta romboguejy upe carbono dioxido emision upe PIB peteĩ teĩ regua peteĩ margen tuichavare 2020pe upe 2005pe guare nivelgui", he'i kuri Hu.
mt: "The carbon dioxide emissions of the global economy will be about 20% higher in 2020 than in 2005, at the current level", says Hu.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Ha'e nomoĩri papaha upe ñemboguejype, ha he'i ha'ekuera ojapotaha upeva China economia rembiapo rapyta rupive.
mt: He said the crash was not related to China's economic slowdown.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu omokyre'ỹ umi tetã kuera subdesarrolladope "ojei haguã upe tape tujagui omongy'araẽvo ha uperire omopotĩ haguã".
mt: "The developing countries are not happy with the way the world is being run and they are getting together."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Ha'e he'i avei "ha'ekuera, uvei,  ndojejopyi vaerã ojapyhy haguã pota'ỹme jejapova ohasava idesarrollo kuerape, arigua ha ikatupyry kuera".
mt: "It's also a matter of pride, that we are not going to be left behind in development, as it were."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Upe Irak Jetypekaha Aty ohechauka kuri imarandu 12:00 GMT ko'árape.
mt: 12:00 GMT is 19:00 local time.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Oje'epohýi kuri ndaiporiha avave ikatuva ome'ẽ garantia  taha'e ha'eva ojejapova Irakpe ko'agã ojokotaha pehẽngue ñorairõ kuera, violencia jejupi tera ojesyry sarambi gotyo.
mt: The government has offered guarantees to the people who have fled the violence in the area, which has been hit by a wave of bombings and shootings.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Upe Marandu oñepyrũ peteĩ jejure mbarete peteĩ ñemongetajovái ha tojejapo upe  ñemoñe'ẽ peteĩ Estados Unidospe upe politica Medio Oriente reheguare.
mt: The conflict began with a dispute over a U.S.-made film and the politics of the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Upe Marandu oñe'ẽreoity hatã aimete opavave mba'ere ko Ejecutivo politica ko'agãguare Irak rehegua ha ojerure moambue hi'aguĩva sãmbyhy.
mt: The government has denied any political motive in the arrest of the Iraqi vice president.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Peteĩha upe 78 recomendacion apytegui ha'e hina peteĩ iniciativa diplomatica puahu ojejapo vaerã opa mboyve ko ary oje asegura haguã Irak frontera kuera umi intervencion hostil ha tojeguereko jevy relacion diplomatica umi tetã kuera ijykeregua ndive.
mt: 78 of the 79 recommendations were to be diplomatic initiatives to ensure a hostile intervention and the destruction of diplomatic relations with the countries involved.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senadora ko'agãgua ha Kuñakarai Peteĩha Argentina pegua Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner omomarandu kuri kuehe pyhare ojecandidataha mburuvichara La Platape, peteĩ táva opytava 50 km (31 milla) táva Buenos Airesgui.
mt: Argentine Senator and First Lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for mayor of La Plata, a city 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Ña Kirchner omomarandu kuri iñintencion oñanitaha mburuvichara Argentina Teatrope, upe tenda voi oipuru vaekue oñepyrũ haguã icampaña 2005pe Senadope guara Buenos Aires provincia atyhápe oikova guaicha.
mt: President Kirchner announced her intention to run for a second term in the 2005 election for the Senate from the province of Buenos Aires, where she currently serves as governor.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Upe ñemongetajovái ojora kuri controversia upe pira pire jeipurúre ojesocorre ha oñemopu'a jey hag̃ua Yvytupochy Katrina rire; ambue impuesto conservador-kuéra ohero va'ekue pukarãpe "Bush Ñemuha Nueva Orleans pegua".
mt: The controversy over the response to Hurricane Katrina has led to criticism of the Bush administration's handling of the disaster.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Umi ñe'ẽreity Liberal kuera ojapova ñeha'ã ñemopu'ajevy haguã ojenfoca kuri umi contrato kuera oñeme'ẽva umi Washington peguape.
mt: Liberal media reports that the contract was awarded by Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Irundy sua ári avakuéra ohókuri Roma-me oĩme hag̃ua funeral-pe.
mt: 20,000 people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Ava kuera papaha oimevaekue upepe hetaiterei ha ndaikatui kuri opavave oike funeral hape Plaza San Pedrope.
mt: A crowd gathered to watch the funeral procession in Plaza San Pedro.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Heta ta'anga mbyry kuera oñemoĩ kuri ambue tenda kuera pe Romape ikatu haguãicha ambue tapicha kuera ohecha upe ceremonia.
mt: Other events in Rome included a mass and a procession.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Heta ambue táva kuerape Italia pegua ha yvyapereguape avei, poravopyre Poloniape, ojejapo avei upeicha, he ojehecha vaekue heta papaha ava kuerare.
mt: Other cities in Italy and in the rest of Europe, including Poland, also reported the same, but it is not yet clear if it is the same phenomenon.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Marandekohaiha kuera okaguai kuri FBI politica tujare ocentra haguere irecurso kuera umi caso ndahaýiva ojemuesakã, umiva ha'e hina mba'yru ñemonda, oñembotuichasegui upe sambyhyha rembiapo porã papaha.
mt: The FBI is investigating the incident as a possible act of terrorism, but the motive is unclear.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Congreso oñepyrũ kuri ome'ẽ pira pire upe iniciativa tie'ỹrehegua ary fiscal 2005pe ha ohai kuri upe FBI omoĩ vaerãha 10 tahachi kakuaa tie'ỹ reguape.
mt: 2005 budget passed and the FBI was given $10 billion to fight terrorism.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robert Uthappa ojapo kuri ijyvateveva jeike puntaje, 70 jeñani 41 vakapipopope oinupavo 11 irundyva ha 2 poteĩva.
mt: Robert Uthappa scored a career-best 70 off 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Umi kuimba'e bateador kuera mbytepegua, Sachin Tendulkar ha Rahul Dravid, ojuga porã kuri ha ojapo oñondive peteĩ ñani 100m pe.
mt: 100m dash record holders Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both ran well and set a new record.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Uvei, itapykuerire upe capitan terrenope, Inda apena ojapo 36 ñani ha itapykue 7 entradape omohu'ã haguã umi entrada kuera.
mt: 36 people were killed and 7 were injured in the attack.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Estados Unidos Mburuvicha George W. Bush oguahẽ kuri Singapurpe upe 16 Jasypateĩ pyhareve, omoñepyrũvo peteĩ pokõi ára jeguata Asiare.
mt: 16 November 2005, U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore for a one-day visit to Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Omomateĩ kuri chupe upe Singapur Mburuvicha Mokõiha Wong Kan Seng; ha upei oñe'ẽ kuri hikuái ñemu ha terrorismore Singapur Mburuvicha Lee Hsien Loong ndive.
mt: Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong were also present.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Ára pokõi rire oñembotapykue haguepe upe jeiporavo ku'a peguape, Bush he'i kuri ava kuerape upe ñemu okakuava hina Asiape.
mt: 24 hours later, Bush said the attack was aimed at the U.S. and Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Mburuvicha Stephen Harper omoñeĩ kuri omondo hag̃ua tetã rekuái 'Lei Pytu Potĩ' upe comite opavave partido kuera pegua ojehecha jey hag̃ua, iñemoñe'ẽ mokõiha mboyve, upe ñemongeta 25 aravo'i rire oguereko vaekue upe Araapype NDP tendota ndive Jack Layton upe PMOpe.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has dismissed a committee of his own party that was set up to investigate, and has since resigned, the so-called "in and out" election financing scandal, in which the Conservative Party allegedly sent out multiple election mailings to the same address in order to claim the cost of the mailing as a tax credit. The committee's report was due on Monday, but the Prime Minister's Office has refused to release it, and the NDP's Jack Layton has called for the report to be made public.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton ojerure kuri ñemoambue upe proyecto lei tekoha regua conservadores kuera mba'e upe ñemongeta aja Mburuvicha ndive, ha ojerure peteĩ "tuichaháicha ha pypuku jehai jevy" upe proyecto lei tekoha regua conservadores kuera mba'eva.
mt: Layton said the project would be "a significant and positive step" toward the conservative goal of a balanced budget.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Upe Tetã rekuái Federal oike guive ocontrola haguã pirapire ñemoĩ Tasyo Mersey Devonport pegua, Tasmania, upe tetã rekuái ha ambue mburuvicha federal kuera okaguai kuri ko leire ha'eha peteĩ ñemaniobra ñepyrũra upe eleccion federalpe ojejapotava hina Jasypateĩme.
mt: The Federal Government has taken control of the Tasmanian port of Devonport, Tasmania, from the Federal Government and other federal agencies, in a move to prevent the election of a federal government in the upcoming federal election.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Uvei Mburuvicha John Howard he'i kuri upe lei ha'e hague oñangareko haguã upe tasyo instalacion kuera ani haguã oñemokangy upe tetã rekuái Tasmania peguare, ome'ẽvo peteĩ AUD $ 45 millon.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said the legislation would allow the installation of a dam in Tasmania, which would cost AUD $ 45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: He'iháicha upe marandu ipyahuvévape, upe para retakue ñemoñe'ẽ ohechaukákuri omoñepyrũhague tsunami. Oĩkuri tsunami ñemongu'e ojeguereko'ag̃uiva'ekue Pago Pago ha Niue-gui.
mt: According to the report, the tsunami warning was issued after a 7.9 magnitude earthquake struck 200 miles (320 km) northeast of Pago Pago, American Samoa. A tsunami warning was issued for American Samoa and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Noñemomarandúi ñembyai vai térã pane Tonga-pe, electricidad katu ohókuri sapy'ami, ha pévagui tendota Togan-gua ndoikuaái Tsunami ñemomarandu og̃uenohẽva'ekue PTWC.
mt: A tsunami warning was issued for Tonga after a 6.9 magnitude earthquake struck the South Pacific nation, but the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center later said there was no threat of a tsunami.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Parundy mbo'ehao kuera Hawaiipe, oimeva y remebe'ype tera aguĩ oñemboty paite kuri upe Ararundype uvei upe ñemomarandu oñemopu'ãma kuri.
mt: A Hawaii high school was placed on lockdown after a student was found with a gun.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Mburuvicha Estados Unidos-gua ojapyhy porã upe marandu.
mt: The United States president was not injured in the crash.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush vocero Gordon Johndroe ohero kuri Corea Yvate gotyogua ñe'ẽme'ẽ "peteĩ paso tuichava upe oñemohu'ãseva gotyo ha'eva nuclearizacion ñembopaha upe Corea peninsulape.
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the move was "a significant step toward ending the threat of nuclear proliferation on the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Upe paha yvytupochy oñembohérava Huracan Atlantico ara vore pegua, Yvytupochy subtropical Jerry, ojepyaha kuri upe yguasu Atlanticope ko'árape.
mt: Hurricane Alex, a subtropical storm, formed in the Atlantic Ocean on Monday.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Upe Centro Tetãgua Huracan regua (NHC) he'i ko'agã Jerry ndaha'éi kyhyjerã yvype.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry is expected to strengthen.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Upe Ingeniero Rete kuera Estados Unidos pegua omboaje kuri okyro 150 mm ikatu ojoka hina umi dique oñembyaima vaekue.
mt: 150 mm diameter pipes can be used to build dams.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Upe Ninth Ward, ohecha vaekue upe y japyhy ohupyty vaekue 6 m upe Huracan Katrina jave, oime hina y  ko'agã ku'a alturape ha'eháicha upe dique aguĩgua ojerebasama kuri.
mt: The Ninth Ward, which was devastated by the storm surge of Hurricane Katrina, is now home to a levee that is 6 meters above sea level.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Y ohasa hina kuri upe dique ari peteĩ seccion ipeva 300 m.
mt: 300 meters of the dike was damaged.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Pipapire ñangarekoha Camara de los Comunes pegua Adam Cuerden omomarandu ipo'a'ỹ umi oñembogue vaekuere oñe'ẽro guare Wikinewspe upe jasy pahape.
mt: Commons Chamber member Adam Cuerden announced the death of a Wikinews contributor on the day of the anniversary of the site.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Ha'e (Wales) ijapu paite ñandeve ñepyrũha guive. Peteĩha, oactuavo pea ojejapoha razon hekopegua rehehape. Mokõiha, ha'e ojapo gua'u ñanderenduramo, hi arte ñemboguepeve".
mt: "He (Wales) is a bit of a late starter. First, he was a bit slow to get going. Second, he is a bit slow to get going, but he is a bit slow to get going."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Umi tekohagua kuera pochy ogueraha kuri upe ñeha'ã ko'agãguape ojehai haguã peteĩ politica contenido meña rehegua upe sitiope oguerekova heta sua medio kuera ilicencia abiertoiteva.
mt: The content of the site is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Tembiapo kuri tuicháicha teórico, katu pe programa ojehai kuri osimula hag̃ua ojejesarekóva Sagitario mbyja atýre.
mt: The program is designed to simulate the motion of Sagittarius A*.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Upe efecto oheka vaekue hina ko equipo ikatu oiko hina marejada rupive upe mbyja aty pokopýva hũ ha upe Kamby Rape pokopýva hũ.
mt: The effect is that the device can be used in a flood situation where the water level is high and the Kamby River is high.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Upe jasy oguereko peteĩ mbarete yvyre, ohupiva pe ypara, upéicha avei pe Kamby Rape oguereko peteĩ mbarete Sagitariore.
mt: 2010 was a year of record-breaking heat, with the hottest temperature ever recorded on Earth, 57.8 degrees Celsius (136 degrees Fahrenheit), in the Sahara Desert. The previous record was 57.7 degrees Celsius (135.9 degrees Fahrenheit), set in Libya in 1922.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Umi cientifico kuera omohu'ã kuri upe pokopýva hũva oafecta umi ambue pokopýva hũvape ojapoháicha avei ambue pokopýva.
mt: The study found that the presence of the dark pigment in the skin of one person affected the skin of other people.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Ko kuaara'ã he'i aimete opavave jepokopýva hũva mbyja aty jerere oime hina umi mbyja aty jerere ha'eteva kora, ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui.
mt: This sentence is a bit awkward.  It is not clear what the "hũva mbyja aty jerere" is.  It is not clear what the "heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "hina umi mbyja aty jerere ha'eteva kora" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta ku'i kueragui" is.  It is not clear what the "ha ojeforma hina heta
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Ta'ãngambyry marãndu ohechauka tatatĩ morotĩ osẽva mba'ejapohágui.
mt: 1,000 people are expected to attend the funeral.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Tendotakuéra upepegua he'ika umi yvypórape oikóva mba'ejapoha ykére opyta hag̃ua hogapýpe, ombogue hag̃ua pytu ñemohendapy ha ani hag̃ua hoy'u y me'ẽhágui.
mt: The people of the area are concerned about the impact of the project on the environment, the health of the population and the future of their children.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Myakãha nuclear Japón-gua he'iháicha, ojehechakuaa oĩha cesio ha yodo iradimbaretekuéva upe mba'ejapohápe.
mt: The Japanese nuclear agency said that cesium and iodine were found in the water.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Tendotakuéra oimo'ã kóva he'ise umi mba'yru oguerekóva uranio okaireíva upe tendápe ikatúraka'e ojeka ha oñehẽ.
mt: The fire was caused by uranium stored at the facility.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Pohãnohára Tony Moll otopa pe Mba'asypo'i Imbaretetereíva Pohã Rovake (XDR-TB) Sudáfrica-gua yvypehẽ KwaZulu-Natal-pe.
mt: Dr Tony Moll identified the first case of extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa in the province of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Peteĩ ñe'ẽjovakéme, ha'e he'íkuri ko variante pyahu "ombopy'apy ha omoãngataiterei ojukahaguére hetaiterei tapichápe".
mt: A spokesman said the variant was "more contagious and more deadly than other strains".
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Pohãnohára Moll oimo'ã umi hasýva ikatuha oipyhýkuri pe vícho tasyópe ha mokõi umíva apytépe ha'e tasyo mba'apohára.
mt: 2 people were injured in the blast and 4 others were arrested.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
